Are there any cities named Santiago in the United States?	yes
Are there any cities named Santiago in the United States?	yes
Are there any cities named Santiago in the United States?	Yes
Was Santiago the name of an indie/punk band?	yes
Was Santiago the name of an indie/punk band?	Yes
Is Santiago a name in Spanish?	yes
Is Santiago a name in Spanish?	Yes
What is the origin of the name Santiago?	Spanish for St. James
What is the origin of the name Santiago?	sanit + iago, James
Who has released an album or song named Santiago?	The Chieftains; Loreena McKennitt
Who has released an album or song named Santiago?	The Chieftains and Loreena McKennitt
What is the Order of Santiago?	a Spanish knightly order
What is the Order of Santiago?	a Spanish Knightly order
What notable people have been named Santiago?	Benito Santiago, Hugo Santiago, Joey Santiago, Liliana Santiago, Rafael Santiago Maria, Santiago Caballero, Santiago Cabrera; James, son of Zebedee
What notable people have been named Santiago?	Benito, Hugo, and others
What fictional stories include a main character named Santiago?	Gears of War, Rainbow Six: Covert Operations Essentials, Death Foretold by Gabriel García Márquez, Ernest Hemingway's The Old Man and the Sea, the television series Babylon 5, Anne Rice's novel Interview with the Vampire, aulo Coelho's The Alchemist (novel), the television show Friday Night Lights
What fictional stories include a main character named Santiago?	Interview with the Vampire, The Alchemist, and others
Is Santiago the national capital of a country?	Yes
Is santiago Spanish for St. James  ( from santo ,  saint  +  iago ,  James  )?	Yes
Is santiago Spanish for St. James?	Yes
What is Santiago?	Santiago is Spanish for St. James. It is also the name of places in Argentina, Brazil, Cape Verde, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Cuba, the Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Guatemala, Jamaica, Mexico, Nicaragua, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, the Philippines, Portugal, Spain, the United States, Venezuela, and the Amazon. It is also the name of a baseball catcher, a film director, a guitarist, an economist, a footballer, a DJ, an actor, and James, son of Zebedee. Fictional people with this name include a character from Gears of War, a character from Chronicle of a Death Foretold, a character in Old Man and the Sea, a character in Babylon 5, a character in Interview with the Vampire, the main character of The Alchemist, and a character on Friday Night Lights. There has also been a battle of Santiago de Cuba, a couple of bands named Santiago, an Order of Santiago, and "Santiago" as a shortened form of the Reconquista battle cry.
